item.title: Introducing XPPL
item.description: Are you tired of (re-)writing the same boilerplace code for every X-Plane plugin project — over and over again? Well, at least that’s how I felt when I started my fourth or fifth plugin. Sure, I reused a lot of my boilerplate code, but with every project, I refined and enhanced it. Backporting those changes to older plugins became a tedious task though; therefore I started the X-Plane Plugin Library (XPPL).
